languages.text: {n}Во взгляде Пощады, обращенном к Джай, вы читаете интересную смесь эмоций. Раздражение, теплоту, интерес... даже обиду. Для него она некто большая, чем просто деловой собеседник.{/n}

{n}You discern an interesting mix of emotions in Mercy's eyes as he looks at Jae: irritation, warmth, interest... even resentment. For him, she is something more than simply an opponent in a business negotiation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Во взгляде Пощады, обращенном к Джай, вы читаете интересную смесь эмоций. Раздражение, теплоту, интерес... даже обиду. Для него она некто большая, чем просто деловой собеседник.{/n}

traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}你注意到，悯慈看着婕伊的眼神中带着各种各样的情绪：恼怒、温和、兴趣……乃至怨恨。对悯慈而言，婕伊绝不仅仅是商业谈判中的对手。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You discern an interesting mix of emotions in Mercy's eyes as he looks at Jae: irritation, warmth, interest... even resentment. For him, she is something more than simply an opponent in a business negotiation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你注意到，悯慈看着婕伊的眼神中带着各种各样的情绪：恼怒、温和、兴趣……乃至怨恨。对悯慈而言，婕伊绝不仅仅是商业谈判中的对手。{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}ジェイを見るマーシーの眼差しには、苛立ち、温かみ、興味…さらには憤りなど、様々な感情がないまぜになっていた。彼にとって、彼女はただのビジネスの交渉相手以上の存在なのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You discern an interesting mix of emotions in Mercy's eyes as he looks at Jae: irritation, warmth, interest... even resentment. For him, she is something more than simply an opponent in a business negotiation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイを見るマーシーの眼差しには、苛立ち、温かみ、興味…さらには憤りなど、様々な感情がないまぜになっていた。彼にとって、彼女はただのビジネスの交渉相手以上の存在なのだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Notas una mezcla singular de emociones en los ojos de Mercy al mirar a Jae: irritación, calidez, interés... y hasta resentimiento. Para él, no se trata solo de una rival en una negociación financiera.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You discern an interesting mix of emotions in Mercy's eyes as he looks at Jae: irritation, warmth, interest... even resentment. For him, she is something more than simply an opponent in a business negotiation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Notas una mezcla singular de emociones en los ojos de Mercy al mirar a Jae: irritación, calidez, interés... y hasta resentimiento. Para él, no se trata solo de una rival en una negociación financiera.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Vous discernez un mélange intéressant d'émotions dans les yeux de Mercy tandis qu'il observe Jae : de l'irritation, de la chaleur, de l'intérêt... et même de la rancœur. Pour lui, elle est plus qu'une adversaire dans une négociation commerciale.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You discern an interesting mix of emotions in Mercy's eyes as he looks at Jae: irritation, warmth, interest... even resentment. For him, she is something more than simply an opponent in a business negotiation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous discernez un mélange intéressant d'émotions dans les yeux de Mercy tandis qu'il observe Jae : de l'irritation, de la chaleur, de l'intérêt... et même de la rancœur. Pour lui, elle est plus qu'une adversaire dans une négociation commerciale.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Du machst ein interessantes Wechselbad der Gefühle in Mercys Augen aus, als er Jae anschaut: Verärgerung, Wärme, Interesse ... sogar Verachtung. Für ihn ist sie mehr als nur eine einfache Gegnerin bei einer Geschäftsverhandlung.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You discern an interesting mix of emotions in Mercy's eyes as he looks at Jae: irritation, warmth, interest... even resentment. For him, she is something more than simply an opponent in a business negotiation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du machst ein interessantes Wechselbad der Gefühle in Mercys Augen aus, als er Jae anschaut: Verärgerung, Wärme, Interesse ... sogar Verachtung. Für ihn ist sie mehr als nur eine einfache Gegnerin bei einer Geschäftsverhandlung.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Jae'a bakan Merhamet'in gözlerinde ilginç bir duygu karışımı görüyorsun: İrite, sıcaklık, ilgi... Hatta alınganlıktan kaynaklı bir kızgınlık. Onun için Jae, iş pazarlığına tutuştuğu bir rakipten çok daha fazlası.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You discern an interesting mix of emotions in Mercy's eyes as he looks at Jae: irritation, warmth, interest... even resentment. For him, she is something more than simply an opponent in a business negotiation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae'a baktığında Merhamet'in gözlerinde ilginç bir duygu karışımı ortaya çıktığı dikkatini çekiyor: İrrite olma, sıcaklık, ilgi... Hatta alınganlıktan kaynaklı bir kızgınlık. Onun için Jae, bir iş pazarlığındaki bir rakipten çok daha fazlası.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy
